verses.verse: Joshua <S%H3091><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> for their heads, <S%H7218><s%> for their judges, <S%H8199><s%> and for their officers; <S%H7860><s%> and they presented <S%H3320><s%> themselves before <S%H6440><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to all the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> <S%H1><s%> 'Your fathers lived <S%H3427><s%> of old time <S%H5769><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the River, <S%H5104><s%> even Terah, <S%H8646><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and the father <S%H1><s%> of Nahor: <S%H5152><s%> and they served <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods. <S%H430><s%>

I took <S%H3947><s%> your father <S%H1><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> from beyond <S%H5676><s%> the River, <S%H5104><s%> and led <S%H3212><s%> him throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and multiplied <S%H7235><s%> his seed, <S%H2233><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> him Isaac. <S%H3327><s%>

I gave <S%H5414><s%> to Isaac <S%H3327><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and Esau: <S%H6215><s%> and I gave <S%H5414><s%> to Esau <S%H6215><s%> Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it. <S%H3290><s%> Jacob and his children <S%H1121><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

<S%H7971><s%>"'I sent Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and I plagued <S%H5062><s%> Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> according to that which <S%H834><s%> I did <S%H6213><s%> in its midst: <S%H7130><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> I brought you out. <S%H3318><s%>

I brought <S%H3318><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> out of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and you came <S%H935><s%> to the sea. <S%H3220><s%> The Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> with chariots <S%H7393><s%> and with horsemen <S%H6571><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%>

When they cried <S%H6817><s%> out to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> he put <S%H7760><s%> darkness <S%H3990><s%> between you and the Egyptians, <S%H4713><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> on them, <S%H3680><s%> and covered them; <S%H5869><s%> and your eyes saw <S%H7200><s%> what I did <S%H6213><s%> in Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and you lived <S%H3427><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

<S%H935><s%>"'I brought you into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> that lived <S%H3427><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan: <S%H3383><s%> and they fought <S%H3898><s%> with you; <S%H5414><s%> and I gave them into your hand. <S%H3027><s%> You possessed <S%H3423><s%> their land; <S%H776><s%> and I destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them from before you. <S%H6440><s%>

Then Balak <S%H1111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor, <S%H6834><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> against Israel. <S%H3478><s%> He sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> to curse you; <S%H7043><s%>
but I would <S%H14><s%> not listen <S%H8085><s%> to Balaam; <S%H1109><s%> therefore he blessed <S%H1288><s%> you still. <S%H1288><s%> So I delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

<S%H5674><s%>"'You went over the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Jericho. <S%H3405><s%> The men <S%H1167><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against you, <S%H567><s%> the Amorite, the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> the Girgashite, <S%H1622><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite; <S%H2983><s%> and I delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

I sent <S%H7971><s%> the hornet <S%H6880><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H1644><s%> which drove them out from before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H8147><s%> even the two kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites; <S%H567><s%> not with your sword, <S%H2719><s%> nor with your bow. <S%H7198><s%>

I gave <S%H5414><s%> you a land <S%H776><s%> whereon you had not labored, <S%H3021><s%> and cities <S%H5892><s%> which you didn't <S%H1129><s%> build, and you live <S%H3427><s%> in them. <S%H398><s%> You eat of vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and olive <S%H2132><s%> groves which you didn't <S%H5193><s%> plant.'

"Now therefore fear <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> him in sincerity <S%H8549><s%> and in truth. <S%H571><s%> Put away <S%H5493><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> which your fathers <S%H1><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the River, <S%H5104><s%> in Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

If it seems evil <S%H7489><s%> to you <S%H4310><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> choose <S%H977><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> whom <S%H5869><s%> you will serve; <S%H5647><s%> whether the gods <S%H430><s%> which your fathers <S%H1><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> that were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the River, <S%H5104><s%> or the gods <S%H430><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> in whose land <S%H776><s%> you dwell: <S%H3427><s%> but as for me and my house, <S%H1004><s%> we will serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"

The people <S%H5971><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> <S%H559><s%> "Far <S%H2486><s%> be it from us that we should forsake <S%H5800><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods; <S%H430><s%>

for it is Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> who brought us and our fathers <S%H1><s%> up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage, <S%H5650><s%> and who did <S%H6213><s%> those great <S%H1419><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> in our sight, <S%H5869><s%> and preserved <S%H8104><s%> us in all the way <S%H1870><s%> in which we went, <S%H1980><s%> and among all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the midst of whom we passed. <S%H5674><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> drove out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> us all the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> even the Amorites <S%H567><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%> Therefore we also will serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for he is our God. <S%H430><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "You can't <S%H3201><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for he is a holy <S%H6918><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> He is a jealous <S%H7072><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> He will not forgive <S%H5375><s%> your disobedience <S%H6588><s%> nor your sins. <S%H2403><s%>

If you forsake <S%H5800><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> foreign <S%H5236><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> then he will turn <S%H7725><s%> and do you evil, <S%H7489><s%> and consume <S%H3615><s%> you, <S%H310><s%> after he has done you good. <S%H3190><s%>"
The people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "No; <S%H5647><s%> but we will serve Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "You are witnesses <S%H5707><s%> against yourselves that you have chosen <S%H977><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> yourselves, <S%H5647><s%> to serve him. <S%H559><s%>" They said, "We are witnesses. <S%H5707><s%>"

"Now therefore put away <S%H5493><s%> the foreign <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> which are among <S%H7130><s%> you, <S%H5186><s%> and incline your heart <S%H3824><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

The people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "We will serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> and we will listen <S%H8085><s%> to his voice. <S%H6963><s%>"

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the people <S%H5971><s%> that day, <S%H3117><s%> and made <S%H7760><s%> for them a statute <S%H2706><s%> and an ordinance <S%H4941><s%> in Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> and he took <S%H3947><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> stone, <S%H68><s%> and set it up <S%H6965><s%> there under the oak <S%H427><s%> that was by the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to all the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Behold, <S%H68><s%> this stone shall be a witness <S%H5713><s%> against us; <S%H8085><s%> for it has heard all the words <S%H561><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> which he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to us. <S%H5713><s%> It shall be therefore a witness against you, <S%H3584><s%> lest you deny your God. <S%H430><s%>"
So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> sent the people <S%H5971><s%> away, <S%H7971><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

It happened after <S%H310><s%> these things, <S%H1697><s%> that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> being one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old. <S%H1121><s%>

They buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the border <S%H1366><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> in Timnathserah, <S%H8556><s%> which is in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Gaash. <S%H1608><s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and all the days <S%H3117><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> who outlived <S%H3117><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and had known <S%H3045><s%> all the work <S%H4639><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> that he had worked <S%H6213><s%> for Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

They buried <S%H6912><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> brought up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> in Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> in the parcel <S%H2513><s%> of ground <S%H7704><s%> which Jacob <S%H3290><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> for a hundred <S%H3967><s%> pieces of money. <S%H7192><s%> They became the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph. <S%H3130><s%>

Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> died. <S%H4191><s%> They buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the hill <S%H1389><s%> of Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> which was given <S%H5414><s%> him in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>
